articles.author: Ella Scott
articles.title: The Moon is drifting away from Earth and it’s having a major impact on time - UNILAD
articles.description: Scientists have discovered that the Moon is drifting away from the Earth at a rapid pace, and it's having a serious impact on how long our days are.
articles.content:
Scientists have discovered that days on Earth are getting longer as the moon is slowly drifting away. 
It has always been assumed that the Earths only natural satellite remained at a constant distan… [+2522 chars]
